titles.title: Fairness and Voter Access Act of 2001

To amend title 18, United States Code, to make unlawful the knowing dissemination of false information regarding elections for Federal office with the intent of discouraging another person from voting.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 1/31/2001--Introduced. Fairness and Voter Access Act of 2001 - Amends the Federal criminal code to establish criminal penalties for any person who knowingly disseminates any information regarding a Federal election that the person knows is false with the intent of discouraging another person from voting.
